message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 5-3-1, translated into en
data: At the global level, the corresponding indicator is “5.3.1: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18”. Global and Vietnamese indicators have the same content. Regarding data sources: This indicator is recommended to be collected through national censuses or household surveys such as MICS and DHS.
